issue.title: [R] altrep vectors for factors (dictionaries)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14282](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14282). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As it is the case in Converter_Dictionary, this should probably be split into 2 paths depending on whether the arrays needs unification (all the levels are the same)
